channel.title: Reading on Yuan-Ru Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Yuan-Ru Lin

item.title: Why RSS
item.description: RSS is an old-fashioned way to receive feeds from creators directly. It allows you to access information in a way that is stable, free of distraction and untouched by algorithms. Below are my feeds. My Curation For Taiwanese I like commentaries or investigative journalism, so here are some of them. They are all free to subscribe, but the last two contain articles that require membership (which deserves the fee, I
